Function reference
Not all functions are supported by all packages. Please refer to the version information inside the function reference to check if the function is supported. Some functionality like experimental features are disabled by default and can be activated by build switches.
The MariaDB client server API is compatible with the MySQL client library. The API was built on top of MySQL 3.23 and PHP's mysqlnd extension. Functions which support specific MariaDB server features are prefixed with mariadb instead of mysql.
